Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Bay City in 1977...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1978, off Cleveland Benson (PIT)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1978...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 6/13/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1982, hitting .519 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/5/1984 to a 5-year deal worth $4,400,000 per year...
Injured on 4/17/1985 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1985...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Bay City on 6/21/1986...
Hit first career homerun on 7/26/1986, off Eddie Swindle (BC)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
